name: The Exfoliation Experience Kit with 2% BHA + 6% Mandelic Acid AHA
about: What it is: A powerful yet gentle duo featuring the bestselling 2% BHA and resurfacing AHA liquid exfoliants to unclog pores, visibly smooth texture, and reveal brighter-looking skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Pores, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid (BHA): Gently dissolves breakout-causing buildup deep within pores..- Mandelic Acid (AHA): Resurfaces texture and disrupts visible discoloration..- Green Tea: Quickly calms redness and soothes barrier...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Take glow to the next level with this mini exfoliating kit. 2% BHA gently penetrates deep within the pore lining to clear blemishes while 6% Mandelic Acid resurfaces texture and tone to reveal brighter-looking skin.  When used alternately in your routine, you’ll see healthier, more evenly toned skin...This Set Contains:- 1 oz / 30 mL Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant.- 1oz/ 30 mL Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant..Clinical Results: Based on a consumer study with 32 people after 7 days of using the 2% BHA & 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant:.-91% agree it's an effective-yet-gentle combination..Based on an independent clinical study with 32 subjects after 4 weeks of using 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant:.- Clinically proven to visibly reduce pores and mattify skin..Based on self-assessment from an independent clinical trial with 30 subjects after 4 weeks of using 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant:.-100% had brighter, smoother, softer skin
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid: Visibly unclogs and minimizes pores..-Mandelic Acid: Gently resurfaces the appearance of uneven texture and tone..-Lactic Acid: Time-released AHA for enhanced exfoliation benefits...Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Methylpropanediol, Butylene Glycol, Salicylic Acid, Polysorbate 20, Camellia Oleifera Leaf Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium EDTA...6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid: .Water/Aqua/Eau, 2,3-Butanediol, Mandelic Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Myrica Cerifera (Bayberry) Fruit Extract, Akebia Quinata Stem Extract, Prunus Lannesiana Flower Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Saccharomyces Lysate, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Arginine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Phytate, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.To Use Separately:.-Apply once or twice daily after cleansing and toning..-Gently shake one to two times onto hands or a cotton pad.  Each provides up to 30 uses..-Apply to face and neck (avoid contact with your lash line and eyelids)..-Do not rinse..-Follow with serum and/or moisturizer..-For daytime wear, always finish with SPF....If you have a salicylate allergy, check with your physician before using any products that contain salicylic acid....Pro tips: .-Alternate using AHA + BHA together for multi-level glow. .-Beginner: Start with AHA or BHA; use alternatively every two to three days..-Intermediate: Alternate AHA & BHA every other day..-Advanced: Use AHA & BHA daily—one in the AM and the other in PM..-For best results, we recommend experimenting with integrating both into your routine.

reviews.review_title: Loved the 2% BHA but did not like the 6% Mandelic

reviews.review_text: Here are my thoughts on the Paula’s Choice Skin Perfecting Exfoliant Set. 5 stars for 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant with Salicylic Acid: - I super love this product - Used it consistently for 7 days (once a day) and it cleared out my acne and flattened it. The one’s left are just acne scars - No issue when I use it in my skin care routine (I double cleanse, use the toner, then add centella moisturizer after)  1 star for 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Liquid Exfoliant: - I tried to use this for 2 days but stopped because my acne worsened - Smells like vinegar to me - I had additional acne and bumps after using it so I stopped using. reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Paula’s choice 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant and the 8% AHA Gel Exfoliant are two effective exfoliants that come in the Exfoliation Experience Kit. It was effortless to incorporate them into my skincare routine.    While the AHA Gel worked on improving the texture of my face and lessening the look of discoloration, the BHA Liquid primarily focused on my clogged pores and acne-prone areas.   It changed everything for me to use the BHA Liquid and AHA Gel in my skincare routine. I went for the AHA Gel in the evening for a mild exfoliation and skin rejuvenation, and I utilized the BHA Liquid in the morning to clear blocked pores and regulate oil production.  They were a wonderful match for one another, giving the skin balance and glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Paula’s Choice The Exfoliation Experience Kit with 2% BHA and 6% Mandela Acid AHA free for review. I have been using 2% BHA liquid in my morning routine and 6% Mandela acid AHA in my evening routine. My skin didn’t feel any irritation. After over two weeks of use, I feel my pores look less pronounced than before. I did not notice any difference in my dark spots but overall complexion appears a little more clear and radiant. Over all I feel it is a good combination of exfoliants to maintain healthy skin . Texture is lightweight for both and go well with other skincare products that I apply on top.

reviews.review_text: Paula's Choice Exfoliation Experience Kit comprises two potent exfoliants: the 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant and the 8% AHA Gel Exfoliant. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This liquid exfoliation duo is suitable for all skin types and targets the following skin concerns: pores, dullness and uneven texture. This travel size kit is not only convenient for when travelling but also if you want to try the product out before spending your money on the full size bottles. I definitely recommend 100% these two exfoliants from Paula’s Choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 🌸Paula's Choice Skincare 2% B HA- AM and AHA- PM Liquid Exfoliant Paula's Choice Skincare offers a range of exfoliators that cater to different skin types and needs.Their products are designed to be gentle yet effective,ensuring you get the most out of your exfoliation experience. Exfoliation is a crucial step in any skincare routine.I received an exclusive travel-size liquid exfoliation duo with 2% BHA to unclog pores and AHA to resurface texture and tone. I have large pores with sensitive,dull skin using these duo removes dead skin cells and debris,leaving my skin feeling smoother and looking brighter.However,with my sensitive skin,it's important to find the right exfoliator for my skin type to avoid irritation or over-drying. The liquid formula is not scented and I have been having a slight reaction and the sensation of warmth that is accompanied by red flushed skin occurring using the products in my routine.They are very effective and have slowly seen changes to my skin complexion.I look more brighter and my pores slightly minimized.They are great incorporating both products into a routine and am still going to continue using them to experience the benefits.My skin is adjusting well,but am not ready to add them to my daily routine just yet,I take it one day at a time.Right now am on every two days routine,since I found every other day was still too much for my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: These two are my favourite because I can take it with me for vacation and they can fit in my makeup bag. I can’t live without these two. My skin is so much better now, I use every other day and my pores are almost gone.

J'ai récemment acheté le kit The Exfoliation Experience de Paula's Choice, et je suis absolument ravie des résultats. Ce duo comprend deux produits : le Skin Perfecting 6% Mandelic Acid + 2% Lactic Acid Exfoliant Liquide et le Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant. Ce duo est parfait pour ceux qui cherchent à améliorer la texture de leur peau et à traiter des problèmes spécifiques comme les points noirs et les pores dilatés. Les produits sont doux mais très efficaces. De plus, le prix pour ces deux exfoliants est très raisonnable, surtout en considérant la qualité et les résultats visibles après seulement quelques semaines. Je recommande fortement ce kit à quiconque cherche une routine exfoliante complète et efficace. Paula's Choice a encore une fois prouvé pourquoi ils sont une marque de confiance en soins de la peau.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Paula’s Choice duo product has visibly reduced my pores, and as someone who has oily skin this has controlled any oil my skin produces. I feel this has really supported my skin's barrier, helping with my acne, and irradiation leaving me with glowing skin! I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying Paula's Choice and I'm pleasantly surprised. I've been dealing with acne and uneven skin texture since I was a teenager and I still struggle with oily skin and clogged pores.  I've been using the Skin perfecting Exfoliation Experience kit for a couple of days and I can already see results. I started by alternating between the AHA and BHA exfoliant until my skin got used to it. Quickly, I was able to use both formulas daily, with the BHA in the morning and AHA before bedtime. The formula is very gentle and doesn't burn my skin.  Just like it says, the products unclogged my pores and visibly reduced the size of my pimples. I noticed my skin became visibly brighter and luminous after a couple of uses. As for discoloration, I understand it may take more time before I notice any clear improvement. So far, so good.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After incorporating the Paula's Choice Exfoliation Experience Kit into my skincare routine, I noticed several remarkable changes in my skin's appearance and health. First and foremost, the clarity of my skin improved significantly. Any pesky blemishes or imperfections seemed to diminish, leaving behind a smoother and clearer complexion. I attribute this improvement to the unclogging action of the 2% BHA and the gentle resurfacing effect of the Mandelic Acid and Lactic Acid blend.  Moreover, the discoloration and uneven skin tone that I've struggled with in the past seemed to fade away gradually with consistent use of the kit. Areas of hyperpigmentation appeared less noticeable, and my skin looked more even-toned overall. This was particularly evident in areas where I've had stubborn dark spots or acne scars.  In terms of luminosity, my skin definitely experienced a boost in radiance. The combination of exfoliating acids in the kit worked wonders in revealing brighter and more luminous skin. I noticed that my complexion looked healthier and more vibrant, with a natural glow that I hadn't seen in a while.  What I love most about this kit is the ability to use both products together in my skincare routine. By alternating between the BHA and AHA or incorporating them both into my regimen, I could target multiple concerns simultaneously. This flexibility allowed me to tailor my routine to address specific skin issues while maximizing the benefits of each exfoliant.  Overall, my skin's health has improved noticeably since incorporating the Paula's Choice Exfoliation Experience Kit into my daily regimen. Not only does it look clearer, brighter, and more even-toned, but it also feels smoother and more balanced. I've noticed a reduction in breakouts and irritation, indicating that my skin's barrier function has strengthened over time. With continued use, I'm confident that my skin will only continue to thrive and look its best.
